short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to show account levels for Hive frontends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When browsing Hive profiles, the extension will display some basic info for the account, such as the amount of Hive Power and the nautical animal name.
